name: python-mro
description: To show the MRO (Method Resolution Order) of a Python class in VS Code.

pythonMRO.hover.enable.description: Enable to show the MRO list when hovering over a class or an object of which type can be inferred

pythonMRO.hoverMethod.enable.description: Enable to show the actual fulfilling class when hovering over a method calling from a class or an object of which type can be inferred

pythonMRO.trace.server.description: Traces the communication between VS Code and the language server.

scripts.postinstall: cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install && cd ..
